parsed.plot: DEV: Rance woke early, prepared for possible Alberich training; groomed and bonded with Senta over evening care. Talia arrived at dawn before Selenay meeting with urgent private matter—has made decision about handling their shared-memory situation, seeks Rance's input before presenting to Queen. PEND: Talia's decision about how to proceed; her meeting with Selenay; Alberich's training approach; how Circle will manage security risk.

entities.c: Fully recovered after grooming and rest—coat restored to gleaming silver-white, energy renewed. Alert and protective, monitoring for threats. STANCE-Rance: fierce protectiveness; bonds come in many forms, all require care; committed to facing everything together.

Emotional state transformed overnight—resolved, controlled, certain (contrast to previous vulnerability). Made significant decision about handling shared-memory situation; seeks Rance's input before Selenay meeting. Still experiencing disorientation: wakes reaching for Rance's memories, only fragments remain; stride differences when walking. Decision 'potentially changes everything about how we proceed.'
